questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) Animal inside carboard box

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A peaceful nature scene
B) A playful animal hiding
C) A quiet street scene
D) A family gathering

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A landscape
B) A person
C) A cat
D) A painting

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A person
C) A cat's face
D) A piece of art

What is in the background of the photo?
A) Mountains
B) Ocean waves
C) Cardboard box
D) A crowd of people

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) Flowers
B) A beach ball
C) A cardboard box
D) A painting

What is the cat doing in the photo?
A) Climbing a tree
B) Sleeping on a couch
C) Peeking out of a box
D) Playing with a toy

What is the color of the cat's fur?
A) Black
B) White
C) Grey
D) Orange

What is the color of the box?
A) Red
B) Blue
C) Brown
D) Green

What can be seen on the box?
A) A painting
B) A label with text
C) A flower
D) A toy

What is the lighting like in the photo?
A) Bright
B) Dim
C) Colorful
D) Harsh

What is the cat's position?
A) Sitting on top of the box
B) Inside the box
C) Next to the box
D) Far from the box

What is the label on the box?
A) A barcode
B) A drawing
C) A photograph
D) A painting

What part of the cat is most visible?
A) Tail
B) Paws
C) Face
D) Back

What is the cat looking at?
A) A toy
B) The camera
C) Another animal
D) A tree

What is the material of the box?
A) Plastic
B) Metal
C) Cardboard
D) Wood

What is the cat's eye color?
A) Blue
B) Green
C) Black and white
D) Brown

What is the photo's orientation?
A) Landscape
B) Portrait
C) Square
D) Panoramic

What is the primary color in the photo?
A) Red
B) Blue
C) Brown
D) Green

What is the cat doing with its paw?
A) Reaching out
B) Holding a toy
C) Scratching the box
D) Sleeping

What is the cat's fur type?
A) Long-haired
B) Short-haired
C) Curly
D) Hairless

What is the cat's nose color?
A) Black
B) Pink
C) Brown
D) White

What is the cat's fur texture?
A) Smooth
B) Rough
C) Curly
D) Spiky

What can be seen peeking out from the box?
A) A dog's paw
B) A cat's face
C) A bird's beak
D) A rabbit's ear

What kind of box is the cat in?
A) A shoe box
B) A wooden box
C) A cardboard box
D) A plastic box
